sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import * as yup from 'yup'; import logo from '../images/logo.png' const data = { email: '', password: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', dob: '', location: '', gender: '', updates: false } const error = { email: '', password: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', dob: '', location: '', gender: '', updates: false } const formSchema = yup.object().shape({ email: yup.string() .required('Please enter a valid email address.'), password: yup.string() .required('Password does not meet minimal requirements.') .min(5, '5 characters minimum required.'), firstName: yup.string() .required('Please enter a valid first name..'), lastName: yup.string() .required('Please enter a valid last name.'), dob: yup.number() .required('Please enter a valid date of birth.'), location: yup.number(), gender: yup.string() .required('Please select a gender.'), updates: yup.boolean() }); const Register = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [form, setForm] = useState(data); const [errorState, setErrorState] = useState(error) const validation = e => { yup.reach(formSchema, e.target.name) .validate(e.target.value) .then (item => { setErrorState({ ...errorState, [e.target.name]: '' }) }) .catch(err => { setErrorState({ ...errorState, [e.target.name]: err.errors[0] }) }) } // const changeHandler = e => { e.persist(); validation(e); setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault(); setForm({ email: '', password: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', dob: '', location: '', gender: '', updates: false }) history.push('/membership/success') } return (

) } export default Register;
